repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Compilation of ILGWU and ACTWU files from UNITE Research Department.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: UNITE Research Department Historic Files #6000/003. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6000/020: UNITE Research Department Files 6000/014: UNITE Research Department Chronological Correspondence Files 6000/020 P: UNITE Research Department Photographs 6000 AV: UNITE Audio-Visual Collection 6000 G: UNITE Posters 6000 MB: UNITE Memorabilia 6000 P: UNITE Photographs

defitem.label: Contact Information:

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: "Industrial Price Policies" - 1938; "A Trade-union Price Program" - April 14, 1947, "Industrial Price and Policies Need Revision" - March 19, 1947
